Parameter.Label: Local protection

Item.Label: No protection. Roller Shutter responds to push buttons
Local protection active. Roller Shutter does not respond to push buttons

Parameter.Help: Enables/disables local entry. If activated module stops responding to S1 and S2 push buttons, SCENE ID and association commands will not be sent. Only exception is the B-button.

Parameter.Label: Radio protection

Item.Label: No protection. Roller Shutter responds to command frames.
RF Protection active. Roller Shutter does not respond to the Zigbee control frames.

Parameter.Help: Enables/disables RF protection. If activated device stops responding to command frames. Configuration and polling still possible.

Parameter.Label: Reports type

Item.Label: Blind position reports sent to the main controller using Zigbee Command Class.
Blind position reports sent to the main controller using Fibar Command Class.

Parameter.Help: Parameters value shoud be set to 1 if the module operates in Venetian Blind mode.

Parameter.Label: Turning time/ delay time
Parameter.Help: In Venetian Blind mode (parameter 10 set to 2) the parameter determines time of full turn of the lamellas. In Gate Mode (parameter 10 set to 3 or 4) the parameter defines the delay time after which an open gate starts closing. Type range

Parameter.Label: Lamellas positioning mode

Item.Label: Lamellas return to previously set position only in case of the main controller operation.
Lamellas return to previously set position in case of the main controller operation, momentary switch operation, or when the limit switch is reached.

Lamellas return to previously set position in case of the main controller operation, momentary switch operation, when the limit switch is reached or after receiving a “STOP” control frame (Switch Multilevel Stop).

Parameter.Help: Parameter influences the lamellas positioning in venetian blind mode (parameter 10 set to 2)

Parameter.Label: Switch type
Parameter.Help: parameter settings are relevant for Roller Blind Mode and Venetian Blind Mode (parameter 10 set to 0, 1, 2).

Parameter.Label: Delay time after S2
Parameter.Help: In roller blind mode or venetian blind mode (parameter 10 set to 0, 1, 2) the parameter determines when the Roller Shutter relays are turned off after reaching a limit switch. In Gate Mode (parameter 10 set to 3 or 4) the parameter determines a time period after which a gate will start closing after a S2 contact has been disconnected.

Parameter.Label: Motor operation detection
Parameter.Help: Power threshold to be interpreted as reaching a limit switch.

Parameter.Label: Motor operation time
Parameter.Help: Time period for the motor to continue operation.

Parameter.Label: Forced Roller Shutter calibration
Parameter.Help: Seting the parameter to 1 Roller Shutter enters the calibration mode. Parameter is only only relevant if a Roller Shutter is set to work in positioning mode (parameter 10 set to 1, 2 or 4).

Parameter.Label: Response to Smoke, CO, CO2 Alarm
Managing lamellas in response to alarm

Item.Label: Set lamellas to their extreme position

Parameter.Help: In Venetian Blind Mode (parameter 10 set to 2), the parameter determines how the lamellas will react upon alarm detection.

Parameter.Label: Power reports
Parameter.Help: Power level change that will result in new power value report being sent. value is a percentage of the previous report.

Parameter.Label: Periodic power or energy reports
Parameter.Help: Time to the next report. Value of 0 means the reports are turned off.

Parameter.Label: Energy reports
Parameter.Help: Energy level change which will result in new energy value report being sent. Value of 0 means the reports are turned off.

Parameter.Label: Self-measurement
Parameter.Help: Enables/disables to include the power and energy used by itself in reports to main controller.

Parameter.Label: Scenes/ Associations activation
Parameter.Help: Parameter determines whether scenes or associations are activated by the switch keys.

Group.Label: Momentary click
Group.Help: Triggered through a momentary switch click or a toggle switch position change

Group.Label: Momentary hold
Group.Help: Triggered through a momentary switch hold
